movies.title: Armitage III: Dual Matrix
movies.plot: Five years after the OAV series, Third series robot Naomi Armitage and her husband Ross Sylibus now live peacefully on Mars with their daughter, until a corporation wants to know the secrets of the third's ability to bear children.
movies.simplePlot: Five years after the OAV series, Third series robot Naomi Armitage and her husband Ross Sylibus now live peacefully on Mars with their daughter, until a corporation wants to know the secrets of the third's ability to bear children.

biography.bio: Ryôka Yuzuki was born on January 10, 1974 in Anjo, Aichi, Japan. She is an actress, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Naruto (2002) and Armitage III: Dual Matrix (2002).
biography.name: Ryôka Yuzuki

biography.bio: Hikaru Hanada is an actor, known for Armitage III: Dual Matrix (2002), Guilty Gear X2 (2003) and Ergo Proxy (2006).
biography.name: Hikaru Hanada

biography.bio: Yuka Imai is an actress, known for Crest of the Stars (1999), Saber Marionette J to X (1998) and Burn Up W (1996).
biography.name: Yuka Imai

biography.bio: Kazuhiro Yamaji was born on June 4, 1954 in Mie, Japan. He is an actor and executive, known for Ghost in the Shell (1995), Tekken: The Motion Picture (1998) and Ghost in the Shell 2.0 (2008).
biography.name: Kazuhiro Yamaji

biography.bio: Daiki Nakamura was born on December 24, 1962 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for My Neighbor Totoro (1988), Naruto: Shippûden (2007) and Lain (1998).
biography.name: Daiki Nakamura

biography.bio: Joji Nakata was born in Tokyo, Japan on April 22, 1954, he is a well-known Japanese voice artist. He attended Gakuen College of Drama in Music, where he starred in various projects. Later, he started voice acting, after Michiko Nomura personally recommended him, and since the beginning of the 90s, he is doing very extensive voice work. Mr. Nakata is affiliated with Osawa Office, and is most well known as the voices of Giroro (Sgt. Frog), Amshel Goldsmith (Blood+), the Count of Monte Cristo, Alucard (Hellsing), Kirei Kotomine (Fate/stay night) and Diethard Reid in Code Geass and its sequel Code Geass Lelouch of Rebellion R2. To mention that Nakata is usually typecast as villain, because of his strong and deep voice. He is known as (Corporal Giroro in Sgt. Frog) or the narrator (Gokujou Seitokai). He has also voiced three major villain characters for Type-Moon works (Nrvnsqr Chaos in Melty Blood, Kirei Kotomine in Fate/stay night, Souren Araya in Kara no Kyoukai)and also as Lord Folken in Escaflowne (2000), the movie. He is very active on television, in theater animation and dubbing for foreign films.
biography.name: Jôji Nakata

biography.bio: Mitsuki Saiga was born on June 12, 1973 in Saitama, Japan. She is an actress, known for .hack//SIGN (2002), Bravely Default: Flying Fairy (2012) and Armitage III: Dual Matrix (2002).
biography.name: Mitsuki Saiga

biography.bio: Takumi Yamazaki was born on April 14, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan as Isao Yamazaki. He is an actor, known for Macross Plus (1994), Hellsing (2001) and s-CRY-ed (2001).
biography.name: Takumi Yamazaki

biography.bio: Hiroaki Ishikawa is an actor, known for Armitage III: Dual Matrix (2002), Memories (1995) and Mobile Suit Gundam I (1981).
biography.name: Hiroaki Ishikawa

biography.bio: Iemasa Kayumi was born on October 31, 1932 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell (1995), Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984) and Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood (2009). He died on September 30, 2014 in Tokyo.
biography.name: Iemasa Kayumi

biography.bio: Katsuhisa Hôki was born on October 29, 1946 in Nagasaki, Japan. He is known for his work on One Piece (1999), Sword of the Stranger (2007) and Origine (2006).
biography.name: Katsuhisa Hôki

biography.bio: Kenta Miyake was born on August 23, 1977 in Okinawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Wolf's Rain (2003), Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent (2013) and Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King (2012).
biography.name: Kenta Miyake

biography.bio: Masako Jô was born on October 12, 1978 in Nagasaki, Japan. She is an actress, known for Numblast (2009), Armitage III: Dual Matrix (2002) and Kobato. (2009).
biography.name: Masako Jô

biography.bio: Masaru Hachinohe is an actor, known for Armitage III: Dual Matrix (2002), Sol Bianca: The Legacy (1999) and If I See You in My Dreams (1998).
biography.name: Masaru Hachinohe

biography.bio: Yukio Hada is an actress, known for Armitage III: Dual Matrix (2002).
biography.name: Yukio Hada
